title: Attestations from different forks included in blocks
body:
### Description
Teku is periodically including attestations where the current justified checkpoint doesn't match the attestation source.  This results in the state transition during block creation failing and the validator misses it's block production duty.

```
2020-05-28 13:02:52.050+00:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | ^[[37mSlot Event *** Slot: 11114, Block: 0x18d8..3b12, Epoch: 347, Finalized checkpoint: 345, Finalized root: 0xda98..3b64, Peers: 29^[[0m
2020-05-28 13:03:00.086+00:00 | ValidatorApiChannel-0 | WARN  | BlockProcessorUtil | process_attestations: Attestation source error 1
2020-05-28 13:03:00.086+00:00 | ValidatorApiChannel-0 | WARN  | StateTransition | State Transition error
tech.pegasys.teku.core.exceptions.BlockProcessingException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: process_attestations: Attestation source error 1
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.BlockProcessorUtil.process_attestations_no_validation(BlockProcessorUtil.java:456) ~[teku-ethereum-core-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.BlockProcessorUtil.process_operations_no_validation(BlockProcessorUtil.java:226) ~[teku-ethereum-core-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.StateTransition.lambda$process_block$0(StateTransition.java:130) ~[teku-ethereum-core-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.state.BeaconStateImpl.updated(BeaconStateImpl.java:273) ~[teku-ethereum-datastructures-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.StateTransition.process_block(StateTransition.java:125) ~[teku-ethereum-core-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.StateTransition.initiate(StateTransition.java:97) ~[teku-ethereum-core-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.BlockProposalUtil.createNewUnsignedBlock(BlockProposalUtil.java:78) ~[teku-ethereum-core-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.coordinator.BlockFactory.createUnsignedBlock(BlockFactory.java:97) ~[teku-validator-coordinator-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.coordinator.ValidatorApiHandler.lambda$createUnsignedBlock$3(ValidatorApiHandler.java:144) ~[teku-validator-coordinator-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.coordinator.ValidatorApiHandler.lambda$createFromBlockAndState$4(ValidatorApiHandler.java:159) ~[teku-validator-coordinator-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.util.async.SafeFuture.lambda$thenApplyChecked$16(SafeFuture.java:283) ~[teku-util-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniComposeStage(CompletableFuture.java:1183) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.thenCompose(CompletableFuture.java:2306) ~[?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.util.async.SafeFuture.thenCompose(SafeFuture.java:320) ~[teku-util-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.util.async.SafeFuture.thenApplyChecked(SafeFuture.java:280) ~[teku-util-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.coordinator.ValidatorApiHandler.createFromBlockAndState(ValidatorApiHandler.java:154) ~[teku-validator-coordinator-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.coordinator.ValidatorApiHandler.createUnsignedBlock(ValidatorApiHandler.java:141) ~[teku-validator-coordinator-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) ~[?:?]
        at jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62) ~[?:?]
        at jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) ~[?:?]
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:567) ~[?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.events.DirectEventDeliverer.executeMethod(DirectEventDeliverer.java:67) ~[teku-events-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.events.DirectEventDeliverer.deliverToWithResponse(DirectEventDeliverer.java:60) ~[teku-events-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.events.AsyncEventDeliverer.lambda$deliverToWithResponse$1(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:70) ~[teku-events-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.events.AsyncEventDeliverer$QueueReader.deliverNextEvent(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:111) [teku-events-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.events.AsyncEventDeliverer$QueueReader.run(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:103) [teku-events-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128) [?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628) [?:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:830) [?:?]
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: process_attestations: Attestation source error 1
        at com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument(Preconditions.java:142) ~[guava-28.1-jre.jar:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.core.BlockProcessorUtil.process_attestations_no_validation(BlockProcessorUtil.java:443) ~[teku-ethereum-core-0.11.3-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.11.3-dev-5f23919c]
        ... 28 more
```
